post:
**Location**: Dallas, TX
**Datacenter**: CoreXchange (Incero)
**Virtualization**: OpenVZ
**Control Panel**: SolusVM
**Setup**: Instant, provided you pass all fraud checks
**IPv6**: Nope. [Blame Incero](http://i.imgur.com/Cp1hF.png).

**OpenVZ 256MB**
2 vCPU Cores
256MB Dedicated RAM
256MB vSwap Memory
10GB Disk Space **(Double to 20GB)**
250GB Bandwidth **(Double to 500GB)**

[$3.50/mo](https://simpleno.de/openvz.php)

**OpenVZ 512MB**
2 vCPU Cores
512MB Dedicated RAM
256MB vSwap Memory
20GB Disk Space **(Double to 40GB)**
250GB Bandwidth **(Double to 500GB)**

[$6.00/mo](https://simpleno.de/openvz.php)
**CPU**: E5-2620 or E3-1270v2
**Network**: [Gigabit](http://i.imgur.com/RQ7Pg.png)
**Drives**: RE4 Drives in RAID10
**Looking Glass**: http://lg.simpleno.de/ (test files are there too)

**Please submit a ticket after ordering and mention LET, and we will double your disk and bandwidth.**
